mean_en: to stop somebody/something from doing something, especially by using physical force; to stop yourself from feeling an emotion or doing something that you would like to do
sentence: I must restrain my anger because he is the boss.
sentence_trans: 我必须抑制我的愤怒，因为他是老板。
word_etyma: re回 + strain拉紧，压 → restrain抑制，限制
